did.abstract: The collection contains 70 letters from Margaret Lewis Livingston to her second-eldest daughter, Gertrude "Gitty" Livingston Lowndes, which document her life as a wealthy wife and mother who split her time between New York City and her Hudson Valley estate in Staatsburgh, NY.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Margaret (Lewis) Livingston (1780-1860) was born in Hyde Park, New York to Geraldine Livingston and Gen. Morgan Lewis. She married Maturin Livingston (1769-1847) around 1798 and the two had twelve children. Her second-eldest daughter, Gertrude "Gitty" Laura Livingston (1805-1883), married Rawlins Lowndes (1801-1877), a businessman from Charleston, South Carolina.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The collection contains 70 letters from Margaret Lewis Livingston to her second-eldest daughter, Gertrude "Gitty" Livingston Lowndes, which document her life as a wealthy wife and mother who split her time between New York City and her Hudson Valley estate in Staatsburgh, NY.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library .

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Mother to Daughter: Letters of Margaret Lewis Livingston to her daughter, Gitty Livingston Lowndes by Mary Mistler (2020), is a transcribed and annotated collection of the letters in the Margaret Lewis Livingston Papers..

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Original processing date unknown. The letters in this collection were formerly part of the Autograph Files collection, but were separated and re-processed as their own collection by Emma Gronbeck, February 2026.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Lydig Hoyt and Geraldine (Morgan) Thompson, great-great-grandchildren of Margaret Lewis Livingston, June 1951.
